title: Can I gift my friend RP or skins??
body:
Hi there, wanted to buy my m8 a League related present. Wanted to gift him some RP but it seems i cant do that, I cant even find the gifting section in the shop. Surely Riot hasnt taken it out.

And help would be great :)

replies.body: If you are on the legacy client sometimes once you're in the store you have to scroll right with the scroll bar at the bottom, and it should be in the top left corner. :)

Hey mate I am currently on the open beta client so the location of where the store is for me might be different compared to the location for you. However the gifting center is in the top right corner for the store highlighted in the image linked below by the red circle.

http://i.imgur.com/2VjNDBB.jpg

Hopefully this helps you find the gifting center on your client, if you aren't on the open beta client let me know and send me a screen shot of what the home page of the store looks like for you so I can give you a hand with finding the gifting center.

Let me know if you need any other help and good luck in your games.

~Elam
